fields.Title of Presentation: Ditch the Points: Reimagining Assessment to Address Learner Growth
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: American Association for Respiratory Care: Summer Forum
fields.Description/Abstract: Fed up with students focusing on point values rather than the learning objectives? What if we stopped assigning point values and started emphasizing individual growth toward demonstration of skill mastery? This session will describe the concept of specifications grading, provide tangible examples of how to incorporate this practice, and discuss the potential benefits (and pitfalls) of reimagining and reestablishing the role of the instructor as the facilicator of learning, rather than the gatekeeper of grades.
